Field Label: What response best decribes you falling asleep over the past seven days?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 0,I never take longer than 30 minutes to fall asleep.|1,I take at least 30 minutes to fall asleep, less than half the time.|2,I take at least 30 minutes to fall asleep, more than half the time.|3,I take more than 60 minutes to fall asleep, more than half the time.

Field Label: What response best decribes your sleep during the night over the past seven days?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 0,I do not wake up at night.|1,I have a restless, light sleep with a few brief awakenings each night.|2,I wake up at least once a night, but I go back to sleep easily.|3,I awaken more than once a night and stay awake for 20 minutes or more, more than half the time.

Field Label: What response best decribes you waking up too early over the past seven days?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 0,Most of the time, I awaken no more than 30 minutes before I need to get up.|1,More than half the time, I awaken more than 30 minutes before I need to get up.|2, I almost always awaken at least one hour or so before I need to, but I go back to sleep eventually.|3,I awaken at least one hour before I need to, and can't go back to sleep.

Field Label: What response best decribes you sleeping too much over the past seven days?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 0, I sleep no longer than 7-8 hours/night, without napping during the day. | 1, I sleep no longer than 10 hours in a 24-hour period including naps. | 2, I sleep no longer than 12 hours in a 24-hour period including naps. | 3, I sleep longer than 12 hours in a 24-hour period including naps.

Field Label: What response best decribes you feeling sad over the past seven days?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 0, I do not feel sad.|1, I feel sad less than half the time.|2,I feel sad more than half the time.|3,I feel sad nearly all of the time.

Field Label: What response best decribes you have decreased appetite over the past seven days?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 0, There is no change in my usual appetite.|1, I eat somewhat less often or lesser amounts of food than usual.|2, I eat much less than usual and only with personal effort.|3,I rarely eat within a 24-hour period, and only with extreme personal effort or when others persuade me to eat.

Field Label: What response best decribes you have increased appetite over the past seven days?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 0,There is no change from my usual appetite.|1,I feel a need to eat more frequently than usual.|2, I regularly eat more often and/or greater amounts of food than usual.|3,I feel driven to overeat both at mealtime and between meals.

Field Label: What response best decribes you have decreased weight over the past two weeks?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 0,I have not had a change in my weight.|1,I feel as if I've had a slight weight loss.|2,I have lost 2 pounds or more.|3,I have lost 5 pounds or more.

Field Label: What response best decribes you increased weight over the past two weeks?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 0,I have not had a change in my weight.|1,I feel as if I've had a slight weight gain.|2,I have gained 2 pounds or more.|3,I have gained 5 pounds or more.

Field Label: What response best decribes you concentration/decision making over the past seven days?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 0,There is no change in my usual capacity to concentrate or make decisions.|1,I occasionally feel indecisive or find that my attention wanders.|2,Most of the time, I struggle to focus my attention or to make decisions.|3,I cannot concentrate well enough to read or cannot make even minor decisions.

Field Label: What response best decribes your view of yourself over the past seven days?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 0,I see myself as equally worthwhile and deserving as other people.|1,I am more self-blaming than usual.|2,I largely believe that I cause problems for others.|3,I think almost constantly about major and minor defects in myself.

Field Label: What response best decribes your thoughts of death or suicide over the past seven days?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 0 ,I do not think of suicide or death.|1,I feel that life is empty or wonder if it's worth living.|2,I think of suicide or death several times a week for several minutes.|3,I think of suicide or death several times a day in some detail, or I have made specific plans for suicide or have actually tried to take my life.

Field Label: What response best decribes your general Interest over the past seven days?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 0,There is no change from usual in how interested I am in other people or activities.|1,I notice that I am less interested in people or activities.|2,I find I have interest in only one or two of my formerly pursued activities.|3,I have virtually no interest in formerly pursued activities.

Field Label: What response best decribes your energy Level over the past seven days?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 0,There is no change in my usual level of energy.|1,I get tired more easily than usual.|2,I have to make a big effort to start or finish my usual daily activities (for example, shopping, homework, cooking, or going to work).|3,I really cannot carry out most of my usual daily activities because I just don't have the energy.

Field Label: What response best decribes you feeling slowed down over the past seven days?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 0, I think, speak, and move at my usual rate of speed.|1,I find that my thinking is slowed down or my voice sounds dull or flat.|2,It takes me several seconds to respond to most questions and I'm sure my thinking is slowed.|3,I am often unable to respond to questions without extreme effort.

Field Label: What response best decribes you feeling restless over the past seven days?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 0,I do not feel restless.|1,I'm often fidgety, wringing my hands, or need to shift how I am sitting.|2,I have impulses to move about and am quite restless.|3, At times, I am unable to stay seated and need to pace around.
